# The `MSP430MachineFunctionInfo` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/msp430machinefunctioninfo">MSP430MachineFunctionInfo</a> - This class is derived from <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunction">MachineFunction</a> and contains private <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/msp430">MSP430</a> target-specific information for each <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunction">MachineFunction</a>. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/msp430machinefunctioninfo">MSP430MachineFunctionInfo</a> - This class is derived from <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunction">MachineFunction</a> and contains private <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/msp430">MSP430</a> target-specific information for each <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunction">MachineFunction</a>.

## Public Member Functions

### clone() {#af6658b90430b420891451c9c8ed93a3e}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>MachineFunctionInfo &#42; MSP430MachineFunctionInfo::clone (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a8e612822d4ba7bb36c9c79582a567108">BumpPtrAllocator</a> &amp; Allocator, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunction">MachineFunction</a> &amp; DestMF, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/densemap">DenseMap</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &#42;, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &#42; &gt; &amp; Src2DstMBB) const</>}
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
Make a functionally equivalent copy of this <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/machinefunctioninfo">MachineFunctionInfo</a> in <code>MF</code>.

This requires remapping <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> references from the original parent to values in the new function. Targets may assume that virtual register and frame index values are preserved in the new function.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/msp430/msp430machinefunctioninfo-h/#l00047">47</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/msp430/msp430machinefunctioninfo-h">MSP430MachineFunctionInfo.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/msp430/msp430machinefunctioninfo-cpp/#l00015">15</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/msp430/msp430machinefunctioninfo-cpp">MSP430MachineFunctionInfo.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### SRetReturnReg {#acb89889920fc55bf1fc527722c9f40fb}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="Register llvm::MSP430MachineFunctionInfo::SRetReturnReg">
SRetReturnReg - Some subtargets require that sret lowering includes returning the value of the returned struct in a register.

This field holds the virtual register into which the sret argument is passed.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/msp430/msp430machinefunctioninfo-h/#l00038">38</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/msp430/msp430machinefunctioninfo-h">MSP430MachineFunctionInfo.h</a>.
